name: Road Bustle
description:
There is a lot of traffic on the roads today.
-Try deliver the package, although you are unlikely to succeed.
-Do not get hit by a car or train.
-Use the transport along the way.
-Beautiful, juicy graphics.
-4 types of transport.
-Endless world.
-Traffic speed grows over time.
Try to score a lot of points. Develop your agility. Have some fun!
Happy delivery!
